async updateLease(lease){console.log('ðŸ”„ Updating lease:',lease);try{const response=await api.put(`/leases/${lease.id}`,lease);console.log('âœ… Lease update successful:',response.data);return response.data;}catch(error){var _error$response4,_error$response5;console.error('âŒ Lease update failed:',error);console.error('âŒ Error status:',(_error$response4=error.response)===null||_error$response4===void 0?void 0:_error$response4.status);console.error('âŒ Error data:',(_error$response5=error.response)===null||_error$response5===void 0?void 0:_error$response5.data);throw error;}},// Delete a lease
async deleteLease(id){await api.delete(`/leases/${id}`);},// Get leases by property
